import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import ExamService from '../services/ExamService'; const ExamResults = () => { const { examId } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { user } = useAuth(); const [results, setResults] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { // Check if user is logged in and is a teacher if (!user) { navigate('/login'); return; } if (user.role !== 'teacher') { navigate('/student-dashboard'); return; } const fetchResults = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const data = await ExamService.getExamResults(examId); console.log('Exam results data:', data); // Ensure statistics object exists if (!data.statistics) { data.statistics = { passed: 0, failed: 0, notSubmitted: 0, passRate: '0%' }; } setResults(data); setError(''); } catch (err) { console.error('Error fetching results:', err); setError('Failed to load exam results. Please try again.'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchResults(); }, [examId, navigate, user]); if (loading) { return (
Loading results...
); } if (!results) { return (

No Results

No results found for this exam.

); } // Ensure statistics object exists const statistics = results.statistics || { passed: 0, failed: 0, notSubmitted: 0, passRate: '0%' }; return (
{/* Header with gradient */}

Exam Results

{results.examTitle}

View detailed performance metrics and student results

{/* Main content - shifted up to overlap with header */}
{error && (

{error}

)} {/* Stats cards */}
{/* Passed */}
Passed
{statistics.passed}
{/* Failed */}
Failed
{statistics.failed}
{/* Not Submitted */}
Not Submitted
{statistics.notSubmitted}
{/* Pass Rate */}
Pass Rate
{statistics.passRate}
{/* Student Results Table */}

Student Results

Detailed breakdown of individual student performance

{results.submissions.map((submission) => ( ))}
Student Score Status Submitted At Actions
{submission.student.firstName?.charAt(0)}{submission.student.lastName?.charAt(0)}
{submission.student.firstName} {submission.student.lastName}
{submission.student.email}
{submission.isSubmitted ? (
{submission.totalScore}%
) : (
N/A
)} 		{!submission.isSubmitted ? ( Not Submitted ) : submission.isPassed ? ( Passed ) : ( Failed )} {submission.submittedAt ? new Date(submission.submittedAt).toLocaleString() : 'N/A'} {submission.isSubmitted && ( )}
{results.submissions.length === 0 && (

No Submissions

No students have submitted this exam yet.

)}
); }; export default ExamResults;
